hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Regime Shift on Regulatory News Spikes
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, a 3+ standard deviation spike in negative regulatory news sentiment (measured via NLP on major crypto news sources) will predict a transition to BEAR regime within 5 trading days with >65% accuracy, providing a short entry signal.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory uncertainty during neutral periods creates asymmetric downside risk as institutional capital becomes hesitant. News sentiment spikes often precede capital outflows by 3-5 days as OTC desks adjust.
entry_conditions: Regime == NEUTRAL for at least 10 days
Regulatory news sentiment score (7-day rolling) drops below -2.0 (normalized)
Enter short BTC on close when above conditions met

exit_conditions.time_exit: 10 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Strategy shows <55% win rate OR average loss > average win when backtested across 2023-2024 regulatory events (SEC actions, MiCA announcements, etc.)
